page.title: 14Biography(2)
page.content: Mr.Charlie Cole was born in 1899.He has lived and worked all his life in our area.His parents occupied a small holding of about 4 acres where they kept 3 cows whose milk they sold to customers in the nearby village of Pontshill. He attended school from the age of four and his earliest memories are of walking to school at Weston,some 2 miles away loaded with milk cans;full in the morning and empty in the evening.He also remembers spinning his top on the way to school along what is now the busy A40 without meeting a horse and trap. At the age of 13 he left school and after trying various jobs he looked after the home farm and became a coal merchant supplying coal from the Forest of Dean.He has worked on most of the farms here and knows them well.
